data.poem: 「秋の田の かりほの庵の 苫をあらみ わが衣手は 露にぬれつつ」
data.romaji: Aki no ta no/Kariho no io no/Toma o arami/Waga koromode wa/Tsuyu ni nure tsutsu
data.trans: Of the autumn paddy, shacks have rough thatching. Sheltering there, my sleeves are wet with dew.

data.poem: 「春過ぎて 夏来にけらし 白妙の 衣干すてふ 天の香具山」
data.romaji: Haru sugite/Natsu ki ni kerashi/Shirotae no/Koromo hosuchou/Ama-no-Kaguyama
data.trans: The spring has passed and the summer come again; For the white robes are spread to dry on the Mount of Kaguyama.

data.poem: 「あしびきの 山鳥の尾の しだり尾の ながながし夜を ひとりかもねむ」
data.romaji: Ashibiki no/Yamadori no o no/Shidari o no/Naganagashi yo o/Hitori ka mo nen
data.trans: Oh, the foot-drawn trail, of the mountain-pheasant's tail, drooped like down-curved branch! Through this long, long-dragging night, must I lie in bed alone?
